title: Into the Nest: Intimate Views of the Courting, Parenting, and Family Lives of Familiar Birds
description: The intimate lives of familiar birds as never before seen! Spectacular, stunning, and beautifulÂ close-up photography documents the family lives of more than 30 birds, from the first song of the courting male to the first flight of the fledglings. You'll find images of the male and female, nest construction, the eggs, the parents on the nest, nestlings, feeding time, fledglings taking their first leap, and more. The featured birds include songbirds, urban birds such as raptors and pigeons, water birds, and owls, all of them common to North America.
author: Marie Read
